summary: Motivated full-stack developer and a student at Inha University, with a strong foundation in modern web technologies and a passion for building scalable, user-friendly applications. Proficient in front-end technologies such as JavaScript (ES6+), TypeScript, React, Redux Toolkit, Axios, i18n, and UI libraries including Material UI (MUI), Shadcn UI, Chakra UI, Framework7, Konst UI, and Tailwind. Experienced with back-end technologies like Node.js, Express, and Django (Python), and databases (MySQL). Skilled in programming languages including JavaScript/TypeScript, and Python, and familiar with tools and frameworks like Git, Bash, REST APIs, and WebSockets. Well-versed in analytical problem-solving and dedicated to delivering high-quality software solutions.

experience.description: Built a user-friendly interface connecting car sellers and buyers using modern front-end technologies. Implemented messaging features to allow seamless communication between users through Telegram, increasing user engagement by 55%. Designed intuitive UI/UX and employed responsive design principles to optimize the application across various devices, improving user satisfaction ratings by 34%.

Developing a web application to facilitate user matching at events, ensuring that participants could easily find and connect with like-minded attendees. Designed with React and integrated with Django. Organising events and help to beginners to start their education path in JS.
